A bedroom set with a cash value of $720 can be purchased on the installment plan for 18 monthly payments of $47.20 each. What is the annual interest rate?

A) 21%
B) 16.8%
C) 24%
D) 15%
E) 25%
F) 19.5
rows.oracle_output:
### Step 1: Calculate the total amount paid

$$
\text{Total amount paid} = 18 \times 47.20 = 849.60
$$

---

### Step 2: Calculate the total interest

$$
\text{Total interest} = \text{Total amount paid} - \text{Value of the car} = 849.60 - 720 = 129.60
